summary: A rebellious student at a girls' school accuses two teachers of lesbianism.
cast: Audrey Hepburn|Shirley MacLaine|James Garner|Miriam Hopkins|Fay Bainter|Karen Balkin|Veronica Cartwright|Mimi Gibson|Debbie Moldow|Diane Mountford|William Mims|Sally Brophy|Hope Summers|Jered Barclay|Paul Bradley|Stuart Hall|George Holmes|Pete Kellett|Florence MacMichael|George Mayon|Harold Miller|William H. O'Brien|Ed Prentiss|Leoda Richards
title: La calumnia
